name: TROC Between the two streams
description:
Discover the first neolithic cities, as a merchant, to pay our father's dot.

Neolithic adventure game

Playable with the mouse

Made by e-artsup students :

Théo Gautier : Producer - Programmer - UI Designer/Artist

Alexandre Crespel : Game Design - Graph

Théo Rodriguez : Level Designer/Builder - UI Artist - Sound Designer

Yann Babef : 3D Modeller
